home.title: Home

metadata.title: Home
metadata.description: Welcome to our homepage. Here you will find information about our programs and services.

home.introduction: Unlock your full cognitive potential with our AI-powered brain training programs. Designed by neuroscientists. Backed by data. Built for results.

features.title: Empowering Minds Through Innovation
features.description: At NeuraBoost, we believe that cognitive enhancement should be accessible, science-driven, and inspiring.

items.name: Latest neuroscience research.
items.description: Our solutions are built on cutting-edge neuroscience discoveries.

items.name: Experienced neuroscientists and AI engineers.
items.description: Our team combines expertise in neuroscience and artificial intelligence.

items.name: Cutting-edge artificial intelligence.
items.description: Advanced AI algorithms adapt to your progress.

programs.title: Explore Our Programs
programs.description: Discover our scientifically-designed cognitive enhancement programs, each tailored to meet your specific needs and goals in brain training.

cards.name: NeuroPerformance
cards.description: A high-intensity cognitive training program that blends physical movement with mental agility.
cards.full_description: A high-intensity cognitive training program that blends physical movement with mental agility. Ideal for professionals and athletes seeking peak performance under pressure. Includes neurofeedback sessions, reaction-based drills, and dual-task training.

cards.name: MindBalance
cards.description: A relaxing program to reduce stress and restore mental clarity.
cards.full_description: A relaxing program combining light movement, breathwork, and guided neurovisualization to reduce stress and restore mental clarity. Perfect for clients dealing with burnout, anxiety, or simply in need of a mental reset.

cards.name: Cognitive Core
cards.description: Designed to strengthen memory, focus, and executive functions.
cards.full_description: Designed to strengthen memory, focus, and executive functions through personalized neuro-games and sensory challenges. Especially effective for students, seniors, or anyone looking to sharpen their mental edge.

clients.name: Emily Watson
clients.quote: NeuraBoost has helped me improve my focus and memory retention significantly. I was struggling with long study sessions before, but now I feel more in control and mentally sharp.

clients.name: Carlos Méndez
clients.quote: The NeuroPerformance program pushed me beyond my limits—not just physically, but mentally. It’s not just a workout; it’s a total upgrade for the brain.

about.title: About

metadata.title: About Us
metadata.description: Learn more about our company and values

about.description: At NeuraBoost, we are committed to enhancing cognitive performance through innovative technology and scientific research. Our mission is to empower individuals to unlock their full cognitive potential.
about.mission_description: Founded in 2022 by a group of neuroscientists and AI engineers, NeuraBoost was born out of a shared passion: helping people achieve mental clarity, focus, and resilience in an increasingly demanding world. We design personalized, data-driven brain training tools to improve memory, attention, and emotional well-being.

blog.title: Blog

metadata.title: Blog
metadata.description: Read our latest articles and updates

blog.description: Stay updated with our latest articles and insights on cognitive enhancement, neuroscience, and brain training.

cards.name: How Cognitive Training Boosts Workplace Performance
cards.description: Discover how targeted brain exercises can enhance focus, decision-making, and productivity among professionals.
cards.author: Dr. Julia Hoffman

cards.name: Digital Detox: Why Your Brain Needs Time Offline
cards.description: Learn the neurological benefits of disconnecting and how scheduled screen-free time can improve memory, mood, and cognitive clarity.
cards.author: Oliver Grant

cards.name: Sleep and Brain Health: What Science Tells Us
cards.description: Explore the link between sleep quality and mental performance, and how better rest leads to sharper thinking and emotional regulation.
cards.author: Dr. Laura Mendez
